author: Special Correspondent
text:
The Aranthangi police, on Monday, arrested M. Kala (30) on a charge of having murdered her two-year-old step-son Dinesh at her residence on Saturday.

The woman, on Saturday, had gone to the nearby fair price shop to get her ration, leaving the child at home after bolting it from outside. On return, she went berserk seeing the child having defecated and started beating the child with a stick. The child died of asphyxiation on the way to the Government Hospital in Aranthangi.

The woman buried the child at her relative’s fields in Anaikadu village in Thanjavur district.

Acting on a tip-off from the people of the village, the Aranthangi police exhumed the child’s body and sent it for post-mortem. The police registered a case of murder and arrested Kala. Further investigation is on.
title: Woman held on charge of killing step-son
